column1: '''Leave Tomorrow Till It Comes''' is a song written by [[Maury Laws]] (music) and [[Jules Bass]] (lyric) and performed by [[Glenn Yarbrough]] for the [[1980]] animated movie [[The Return of the King (1980 film)|''The Return of the King'']].

column3:
>
Leave tomorrow till it comes;
Sleep will ease your mind.
With the dawn, you'll find
Problems realigned a different way
Than yesterday.

Leave tomorrow till it comes;
Time is moving fast.
Don't go pushing past;
Endings of the day were meant to last
Till yesterday.

Tangled dreams unfold,
And webs may disappear.
Stories are retold,
And cloudy thoughts will clear.

Leave tomorrow till it comes;
Sleep will ease your mind.
With the dawn, you'll find
Problems realigned a different way
Than yesterday...
Than yesterday.
</poem>
